location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Charles Allan Baylay, Aboo [Ābu] to Sir Lewis Pelly, Agent to the Governor-General for Rajpootana [Rājasthān]

mods.abstract: Letter regarding Pelly's decision to return to England for health reasons and expressing his hopes that the rest from work and change of air will help him.The letter goes on to discuss arrangements for Baylay to care for Pelly's kit at Aboo [Ābu]; to remind him that he still has a box of confidential papers belonging to Pelly in his care; and to describe the various items of furniture which are still there.
